name: Drop Ballz!
description:
Break the blocks and break the stress!
Try to get rid of the blocks coming up with bobbling balls!

It is too easy,
What you should do is only,
Set the direction, and Drop the balls!
The balls will break blocks, bobbling in the screen!

I recommend you should burst all the Bombs
that sometimes appear between blocks.
It'll blow all the blocks away around it.

Who will record the best score?

Drop Ballz, Get started now!
